# Fluid Attacks Environment Setup

## Requirements

- git
- python
- Nix
- make

## Install makes

```
nix profile install github:fluidattacks/makes/22.04
```

## Run setup

```
git clone https://github.com/afgalvan/fluid-setup
cd fluid-setup
make setup
```

```
 ___
| >>|> fluid
|___|  attacks, we hack your software
```
